God knows why, but I made a small #RStats package that simulates the original Game Boy graphics for a given image.  Naturally, I'm now using it on iconic/famous photos (and of course, @hadleywickham twitter profile pic) #tidyverse #ggplot2 Code here https://t.co/eTo5SM6j6N https://t.co/8nTTSXKdMF

I went back and looked at one of the first big #rstats scripts I ever wrote, and woo boy, in addition to loading like 30 libraries and using setwd("hard_coded_path"), it contained this little gem. So basically, don't feel bad about your code, it could be worse https://t.co/PcSXL2lgTz
